==Commands==
*Pressing '''$''' in a [[shop]] is the command to move all selected items for sale to your shopping list. The game will alert you when you acquire enough [[gold]] to afford an item on your shopping list. 
*Pressing '''$''' when not in a shop will bring up your shopping list for examination, and selecting any item on the list will make you travel to its shop automatically.

==Symbols==
While playing in console mode:
*'''$''' represents a pile of [[gold]].
